titleStmt.title: A Sermon preached at the court at White Hall before the Kings Maiesty, vpon Sunday being the 13. of May 1604. By Anthony Rudd Professor of Diuinitie, and Bishop of Saint Dauids
titleStmt.author: Rudd, Anthony, 1549 or 50-1615.
T. W., fl. 1604.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by R. Field] for Thomas Man,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Yale University Library.
